channel.title: Eason Study Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Eason Study Blog

item.title: Markdown Guide
item.description: Overview Nearly all Markdown applications support the basic syntax outlined in John Gruber’s original design document. There are minor variations and discrepancies between Markdown processors — those are noted inline wherever possible. Headings To create a heading, add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase. The number of number signs you use should correspond to the heading level. For example, to create a heading level three (), use three number signs (e.

item.title: How to Upload my Blog to Github
item.description: How to Upload my Blog to Github Upload local server hugo server -t m10c --buildDrafts Use http://localhost:1313/ to check. Upload to my Github hugo --theme=m10c --baseUrl="https://Eason366.github.io/" --buildDrafts #Create web page cd public #Enter the public folder git add . git commit -m #"commit" git push -u origin master Use https://eason366.github.io/ to check. Creat a new Blog hugo new post/#BlogName.md

item.title: Regression Analysis on Wine Qualit
item.description: Introduction The study of interest was with regards to the factors that affect the quality of red wine. The data used was obtained from https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/wine-quality/. For the study, quality was therefore used as the dependent variable, while independent variables used were; residual sugar, chlorides, total sulfur dioxide, pH, sulphates, and alcohol. To identify if the independent variables were significant predictors of quality, multiple linear regression was carried out using R.
